description: After a gluten-free pizza? Try using cauliflower to make the base. Learn how with this easy recipe, then top your base with ricotta, kale and cauliflower.
keywords: Cauliflower pizza crust,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Sep 2021,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower Pizza With Ricotta & Kale Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg cauliflower, cut into small florets, stem trimmed and coarsely chopped
1 Woolworths free range egg, lightly beaten
0.5 small red onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200째C/180째C fanforced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.

Place 800g cauliflower, including stems, in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Spread over tray and bake, stirring halfway, for 15 minutes or until tender. Set aside for 5 minutes to cool slightly. Increase oven to 230째C/ 210째C fanforced.
Transfer cauliflower to a clean tea towel and squeeze to remove excess liquid. Place cauliflower in a medium bowl. Add parmesan, almond meal and egg, mixing to combine.
Place cauliflower mixture on relined tray and press to form a 25cm circle. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden.
Spread ricotta over base. Top with kale, remaining cauliflower, onion and chilli. Spray with oil and bake for 12 minutes or until florets are golden and kale is crispy. Serve.
